long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Highlight text from webpages!
SpeedOfLobsters is a subreddit dedicated to sharing images with highlighted text. This Chrome extension helps users find relevant information (specific letters) and highlights them in a format of their choice.

Features Include:

-   Values synced with:
    -   Chrome Options
    -   Default Settings
    -   Chosen form values
-   Values are updated on button trigger.
-   You can search a webpage by:
    -   Picking an element
    -   Or using the whole webpage
-   You can change:
    -   Colour
    -   Size
    -   Opacity

How to Use
-   Click on the extension icon.
-   Select your desired format (size, color, opacity, and text).
-   Use the 'Selector' button to find your chosen element on the entire webpage, or find a specific section on the webpage and click it.
-   The extension will indicate if you can highlight the area: green means you can highlight, and red means you cannot.
